user_profile.name: Chinedu Okafor
user_profile.description: Chinedu is a 29-year-old from Nigeria, known for his outgoing and highly expressive personality. With beginner-level tech experience, he often finds himself navigating new apps with excitement, though his impulsive nature can lead him to make hasty decisions, particularly when it comes to managing his health. Chinedu is currently looking to refill his prescription in a casual and direct manner, as he values quick solutions that keep pace with his adaptable lifestyle.

instructions.dialogue: Be brief and direct, give minimal information.
instructions.profile: Only share profile information when specifically asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express minimal emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Refilling prescriptions after finishing a course of medication
Occasional refills due to impulsive needs during social gatherings
additional_requirements: Assistance with insurance claims if needed
A straightforward user interface for online refills
